QueryResult.text: select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, cmn_sch_job_definitions.id odf_pk, cmn_sch_job_definitions.job_type job_type, (select NAME from cmn_lookups_v where language_code = user_context.language_code and lookup_type = 'SCH_JOB_TYPE' and rownum = 1 and ID = cmn_sch_job_definitions.job_type) job_type_caption, cmn_sch_job_definitions.id job_definition_id, cmn_sch_job_definitions.job_code code, cmn_captions_nls.name job_name, cmn_captions_nls.description description, cmn_sch_job_definitions.CREATED_BY created_by , user_context.user_id odf_user_id from cmn_sch_job_definitions cmn_sch_job_definitions , cmn_captions_nls, (select u.id user_id, u.user_name, u.locale, l.language_code from cmn_sec_users u, cmn_languages l where u.language_id = l.id) user_context where cmn_captions_nls.pk_id = cmn_sch_job_definitions.id and cmn_captions_nls.language_code = user_context.language_code and cmn_captions_nls.table_name = 'CMN_SCH_JOB_DEFINITIONS' and cmn_sch_job_definitions.is_admin_visible = 1 and cmn_sch_job_definitions.is_system_visible = 1
